cb4864ba1ac1.actionBody:
user.paste("""---
title: "PDF Summary
author: "Colton Loftus"
date: "`r format(Sys.time(), '%d %B, %Y')`"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE""")
user.paste("""}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
```

""")
'
```'
user.paste("{}")
key(left)
"r"
key(end)
"

```"
key(up)

# set the search pattern for 'n' usage

key('0')
# do the actual search to include results under the cursor
user.vim_run_command(":call search(\"0x\", 'c', line('.'))\n")
insert("{ordinals-1}n")
insert("ye")
user.vim_run_command(":set nohls\n")

0259a4b66bec.actionBody:
#    user.vim_terminal_echo_line_number("{number_small}")
user.vim_run_normal_exterm("{number_small}k")
key('0')
insert("yE")
# See `:help pattern`
# \_s   - match single white space
# \{2,} - at least two in a row
user.vim_run_command(":set nohls | let @+=substitute(strtrans(@+), '\\_s\\{{2,}}', '', 'g')\n")
user.vim_set_insert()
edit.paste()
key(space)

56932f336232.actionBody:
user.vim_normal_mode_exterm(":call search(\"{text}\", 'bcW')\n")
insert("y$")
insert(":set nohls\n")
user.vim_set_insert_mode()
edit.paste()

c4cfec0b480b.actionBody:
user.vim_normal_mode_exterm("{number_small}k")
key('0')
insert(":call search(\"{text}\", 'c', line('.'))\n")
insert("y$")
insert(":set nohls\n")
user.vim_set_insert_mode()
edit.paste()

b8ccaaef90da.actionBody:
user.vim_normal_mode_exterm("{number_small}k")
key('0')
insert("{ordinals-1}W")
insert("y$")
user.vim_set_insert_mode()
edit.paste()
key(space)

39b558c0dc77.actionBody:
#    user.vim_terminal_echo_line_number("{number_small}")
user.vim_normal_mode_exterm("{number_small}k")
key('0')
insert("yE")
# See `:help pattern`
# \_s   - match single white space
# \{2,} - at least two in a row
user.vim_command_mode(":set nohls | let @+=substitute(strtrans(@+), '\\_s\\{{2,}}', '', 'g')\n")
user.vim_set_insert_mode()
edit.paste()
key(space)

b71b6304fb29.actionBody:

insert("{ordinals-1}W")
insert("yE")

user.vim_set_insert_mode()
edit.paste()

53126c547bb2.actionBody:
user.vim_normal_mode_exterm("{number_small}k")
key('0')
insert("f{unmodified_key}")
insert("yE")

user.vim_set_insert_mode()
edit.paste()
# disable weird highlight
key(down:5)

e88cb6f570a5.actionBody:

key('0')
insert("f(")
insert("yB")

user.vim_set_insert_mode()

# disable weird highlight
key(down:5)
